Sentencas: Gd-doped ceria (GDC) is a promising solid electrolyte for intermediate temperature solid oxide fuel cells (IT-SOFCs) due to its high oxygen-ion conductivity.
Titulo: Enhanced ionic conductivity and suppressed electronic conductivity of an Aland Mn-added ceria solid electrolyte

Sentencas: However, commercialization is limited due to high grain boundary resistance and electronic conduction in reduced conditions.
Titulo: Enhanced ionic conductivity and suppressed electronic conductivity of an Aland Mn-added ceria solid electrolyte

Sentencas: In this work, Al- and Mn-added GDCs were designed to overcome their weaknesses.
Titulo: Enhanced ionic conductivity and suppressed electronic conductivity of an Aland Mn-added ceria solid electrolyte

Sentencas: GDC and Al- and Mn-added GDC powders were prepared using spray pyrolysis and then sintered using spark plasma sintering technique to obtain dense ceramic pellets.
Titulo: Enhanced ionic conductivity and suppressed electronic conductivity of an Aland Mn-added ceria solid electrolyte

Sentencas: Additives enhanced the sinterability of the ceria leading to an increase in ionic conduction.
Titulo: Enhanced ionic conductivity and suppressed electronic conductivity of an Aland Mn-added ceria solid electrolyte

Sentencas: More importantly, electronic conduction in GDC with the additives was suppressed under reduced conditions.
Titulo: Enhanced ionic conductivity and suppressed electronic conductivity of an Aland Mn-added ceria solid electrolyte

Sentencas: This demonstrates that Al- and Mn-added GDC is a possible candidate as a solid electrolyte for IT-SOFCs.
Titulo: Enhanced ionic conductivity and suppressed electronic conductivity of an Aland Mn-added ceria solid electrolyte
